frontend.impl.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • frontend.impl.view.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class View
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This Class extends JPanel and controls the mouse events to draw, select or remove items. If the user clicks or releases the mouse button or moves the mouse over this panel, the events would be redirected to the selected tool. (e.g. a mouse click if the line tool is selected would create a new line, move would resize the line and release fix the size and position of the line) If items were deleted, added or changed, this class will be informed and repaints
    Author:
    zannc2 & gfels4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
